## GroupHasErrorDirective.unregisterControl() method

Unregisters control from invalid controls

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unregisterControl(id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> | Id of control to be unregistered |
